readme.title: README
readme.entries:
"Hey there! To setup this widget correctly, you'll need to install Tasker. Please read the setup instructions at my GitHub here:
<URL>

Highlights of this widget are a OneUI based interface thats full customizable down to margins and corner radius. Features includes:
- Modify icon sizes, padding and spacing to get the look you want
- Automatic resizing and adjusting of layout, with further manual adjustments
- "setup" mode which allows you to view all the data for spacing and icons you need
And many more!

Created by Corey Welsh to fill the need of an easy-setup Home Assistant widget also looks great"
readme.value:
Hey there! To setup this widget correctly, you'll need to install Tasker. Please read the setup instructions at my GitHub here:
<URL>

Highlights of this widget are a OneUI based interface thats full customizable down to margins and corner radius. Features includes:
- Modify icon sizes, padding and spacing to get the look you want
- Automatic resizing and adjusting of layout, with further manual adjustments
- setup mode which allows you to view all the data for spacing and icons you need
And many more!

Created by Corey Welsh to fill the need of an easy-setup Home Assistant widget also looks great

- 1..entries:
-- Color Options --
Click to read color editing options

To edit the filters put onto the color, look for the dark or light color calculations in the flows tab. Follow the guide on github for color edits

colors/col1sel.title: col1sel
colors/col1sel.description: Color 1 - Choose the color source for the smaller box background. If you dont use the color picker, set a color you like, and it will be used as a fallback

colors/col1sysc.title: col1sysc
colors/col1sysc.description:
Color 1 - System/MaterialYou Only
Choose a color tone.

colors/col1fil2.title: col1fil2
colors/col1fil2.description: Color 1 - Choose filter manipulation - Changes slider above from total into add/subtract from current (optional)

colors/col1pick.title: col1pick
colors/col1pick.description:
Color 1 - Manual Color choice, overrides filter
Also used as fallback color for extracted colors

colors/col2sel.title: col2sel
colors/col2sel.description: Color 2 - Choose the color source for the larger box background. If you dont use the color picker, set a color you like, and it will be used as a fallback

colors/col2sysc.title: col2sysc
colors/col2sysc.description:
Color 2 - System/MaterialYou Only
Choose a color tone

colors/col2fil2.title: col2fil2
colors/col2fil2.description: Color 2 - Choose filter manipulation - Changes number above from total into add/subtract from current (optional)

colors/col2pick.title: col2pick
colors/col2pick.description:
Color 2 - Manual Color choice, overrides filter.
Also used as fallback color for extracted colors

colors/colico.title: colico
colors/colico.description: Color of icons and text. Default: #E7FFFFFF

colors/colonico.title: colonico
colors/colonico.description: Color of icons and text when device is on

wgtboxsw.title: wgtboxsw
wgtboxsw.description: Swap the large and Box 1es on your Widget

wgtmode.title: wgtmode
wgtmode.description: Choose Widget box scaling. Match to what your current preset requires
wgtmode.entries: 0##4 Device Controls, 1##2 Device Controls, 2##1 Device Control, 3##Logo/Icon, 4##Hidden

smboxper.title: smboxper
smboxper.description: Choose how many icons you want shown in the smaller box. If using single room controls, choose 2. Default: 4

corrad.title: corrad
corrad.description:
Set the radius of the rounded corners.
Default: 10kpx

icomain.title: icomain
icomain.description:
Set the size of the main icons.
Default: 80kpx

icosm.title: icosm
icosm.description:
Set the size of the small icon(s).
Default: 32kpx

icodev.title: icodev
icodev.description:
Set the full size of the device icon.
Default: 120kpx

icodevsm.title: icodevsm
icodevsm.description:
CHANGE TO icodevsc - Control the size of the device icon.
Default: Auto-adjust
icodevsm.entries: 0##Normal Device icon size, 1##Match small icons, 2## Auto-shrink for smaller widget

icomarg.title: icomarg
icomarg.description:
Set the margin between the edge of widget and the icons.
Default: 10kpx

icopad.title: icopad
icopad.description:
Set the padding between icons in a row.
Default: 20kpx

padside.title: padside
padside.description:
Set the padding from the edge of screen to the side of widget.
Default: 15kpx

padupdwn.title: padupdwn
padupdwn.description: Set the padding from the edge of screen to the top/bottom of widget. Will double when two widgets are stacked. Default: 4kpx

icohide.title: icohide
icohide.description:
Hide the settings icons.
Off = Show settings, On = Hide settings

setupmde.title: setupmde
setupmde.description: ADVANCED: Enable showing setup data. This will give you numbers and information for fine-tuning the widget to fit your device screen

icopadr.title: icopadr
icopadr.description: ADVANCED: Remove icon padding for settings while leaving icons. You may need to adjust icon size to prevent overlapping. Default: Off

autoalig.title: autoalig
autoalig.description: ADVANCED - Manually set layout direction of widget. Use with next 2 options to configure

wgtalign.title: wgtalign
wgtalign.description: ADVANCED - Auto horizontal or vertical alignment based on widget sizing

position.title: position
position.description: ADVANCED - Change the alignment of the smaller box. Use with two previous settings
position.entries: LEFT##Left - Horizontal Layout, RIGHT##Right - Horizontal Layout, TOP##Top - Vertical Layout, BOTTOM##Bottom - Vertical Layout

generate.title: generate
generate.description: Generated Globals. Editing these formula may cause unintended issues. Proceed with caution.

generate/col1.title: col1
generate/col1.description: GENERATED - Background color generated from user settings for smaller box
generate/col1.global_formula:
$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col1pick)))$

$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col1alph), 0)))$
$#final$

generate/col2.title: col2
generate/col2.description: GENERATED - Background color generated from user settings for larger box
generate/col2.global_formula:
$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col2sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col2sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col2fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col2pick)))$


$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col2alph), 0)))$
$#final$

generate/wgwidth.title: wgwidth
generate/wgwidth.description: GENERATED - Width of widget, minus padding

generate/wgheight.title: wgheight
generate/wgheight.description: GENERATED - Height of widget, minus padding

generate/smboxw.title: smboxw
generate/smboxw.description: GENERATED - Width of the smaller box

generate/smboxh.title: smboxh
generate/smboxh.description: GENERATED - Height of the smaller box

generate/lgboxw.title: lgboxw
generate/lgboxw.description: GENERATED - Width of the larger box

generate/lgboxh.title: lgboxh
generate/lgboxh.description: GENERATED - Height of the larger box

generate/icocount.title: icocount
generate/icocount.description: GENERATED - Number of icons visible in a row. Based on widget size and padding
generate/icocount.global_formula:
$/* Generate number of icons able to be shown
Calculate icon sizes, padding and widget alignment */
lv(icon, gv(icomain) + gv(icopad))$$lv(lgbox, if(gv(wgtalign) = 0, gv(generate/lgboxw), gv(generate/lgboxh)))$

$/* Subtract settings icons, unless they're gone.
Get final number: Icon size / Box - settings */
lv(adjustment, if(gv(icopadr) = 0, gv(icosm), 0))$
$lv(boxsize, #lgbox - #adjustment)$
$lv(count, #boxsize / #icon)$
$if(#count <= 2, 2, tc(cut, mu(abs,#count), 1))$

generate/lgboxmin.title: lgboxmin
generate/lgboxmin.description: GENERATED - Minimum size of device Control box. Based on icon sizes and padding
generate/lgboxmin.global_formula:
$/* If padding is hidden, remove from calculation */lv(icoopt, if(gv(icopadr) = 0,  (gv(icodevge)), 0))$

$/*Calculate the minimum size Box 2 can be (2 icons) */
((gv(icomain) * 2) + (gv(icomarg) * 2) + gv(icopad) + #icoopt)$

generate/icodevge.title: icodevge
generate/icodevge.description: GENERATED - Minimal device logo. Uses HA icon size and padding to align outside edge of icons
generate/icodevge.global_formula:
$lv(small, gv(icomarg) + gv(icosm))$
$lv(large, gv(icodev))$
$lv(autoshr, (if(gv(generate/icocount) < 4 & gv(icodevsm) = 2, 1, 0)))$
$lv(1row, (if(si(rheight) <= 150, 1, 0)))$
$if(#autoshr = 1 | gv(icodevsm) = 1 | #1row = 1, #small, #autoshr = 0 | gv(icodevsm) = 0, #large)$

tasker.title: tasker
tasker.description: Global variables to be updated with tasker data

tasker/hactrl.title: hactrl
tasker/hactrl.description: GENERATED - Device control data from touch event of each button

colors/col2fin.title: col2fin
colors/col2fin.description: Final output of color in ARGB form

params.formula:
$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col1pick)))$

$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col1alph), 0)))$
$#final$

$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col2sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col2sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col2fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col2pick)))$


$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col2alph), 0)))$
$#final$

$lv(srvccall, tc(split, gv(tasker/hactrl2), "&", 0))$$lv(entityid, tc(split, gv(tasker/hactrl2), "&", 1))$$lv(data, tc(split, gv(tasker/hactrl2), "&", 2))$$lv(recomb, "tasker://secondary?service_call=" + #srvccall + "&entity_id=" + #entityid + "&parameters=" + #data)$$#recomb$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, CENTERRIGHT, gv(position) = LEFT, CENTERLEFT,  gv(position) = TOP, TOP,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, BOTTOM)$
$if(gv(wgtalign) = 0, CENTERRIGHT, TOP)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression: the second icon will be hidden
the second icon will be hidden
the second icon will be hidden

internal_formulas.icon_rotate_mode: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, NONE,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
Widget Padding: $gv(padside)$ Side, $gv(padupdwn)$ Top
Icon: $gv(icomain)$kpx, $tc(reg, gv(generate/icocount), "\n", "")$ Vis
Icon Padding:$gv(icomarg)$ Edge, $gv(icopad)$ MID

[bl=-10]Widget: $si(rwidth)$W, $si(rheight)$H, $si(rratio)$ 1:1
Box Area: $tc(reg, gv(generate/lgboxmin), "\n", "")$ Min, $gv(generate/lgboxw)$W/$gv(generate/lgboxh)$H

$lv(icon, gv(icomain) + gv(icopad))$$lv(lgbox, if(gv(wgtalign) = 0, gv(generate/lgboxw), gv(generate/lgboxh)))$$lv(adjustment, if(gv(icopadr) = 0, gv(icosm), 0))$$lv(boxsize, #lgbox - #adjustment)$Icon to size ratio: $mu(abs, #boxsize /#icon)$[/bl]

$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$source: $#source$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$filter: $#filter$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$color tone: $#coltone$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$ addsub: $#addsub$

$si(#source)$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col1adj))))$wpcolor: $#col1$
$ce("#FF000101", sat, 45)$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col1adj))))$sysui: $#col2$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col1pick)))$colpick: $#col3$

$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, #col3)))$$#color$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, gv(colors/col1alph)))$
Final color: $#final$
